resources.string: Use your fingerprint to unlock your notes
Specify time before deleting from Trash
Set time for Reminder to notify
Nitrogen Notes is an Android Note/Task input application built by Red Nitrogen.

Red Nitrogen is an independent developer specialized in development of Android App Development creating new trends across the app space. Keep an eye out for future projects on Play Store Developer page. Glad to Help in anyway!

This mobile application is made available by Red Nitrogen.

 You, the user of the App, confirm your acceptance of these App terms of use. If you do not agree to these App Terms, you must immediately uninstall the App and discontinue it's use. These App Terms should be read alongside Privacy Policy.

 If you have any questions regarding our App, you can email us at rednitrogen@protonmail.com

What information is/may be collected from you?

 This app has no registration/login process and works offline. Your information are safe with you and we cannot collect any data from you by any means.

 Policy updates

 Red Nitrogen reserves the right to change or update this policy at any time. Such changes shall be effective immediately upon version update on Play Store.
